quantity.description: On a scale of 1 to 5, how intense was it?

quality.description: On a scale of 1 to 5, how much did you enjoy it?

notes.description: Describe your reaction and any specific notes.

date.description: The date you brewed this coffee.

region.description: The region or coop, such as 'Worka' or 'Nano Challa'.

origin.description: The area in which this coffee was grown.

roaster.description: The name of the individual or business who roasted the coffee.

roastDate.description: The date this coffee was roasted.

coffee.description: The coffee beans used in your brew.

method.description: The method used to brew your coffee, such as 'Chemex' or 'Hario V60'.

grinder.description: The grinder make and model you used, such as 'Hario Skerton' or 'Baratza Encore'.

equipment.description: The equipment used to make this brew.

ratio.description: The ratio of coffee to water, such as '1:16' or '22g:340g'

grind.description: The number of clicks, with zero being when burrs are fully closed.

pourTime.description: The total time from beginning of bloom until a steady stream suddenly falters to separate drops.

technique.description: The techniques you used to brew your coffee, such as 'bloom swirl' or 'Rao Spin'.

aroma.description: The smell of your brew (low to high), such as 'caramel', 'peach', or 'chocolate'.

acidity.description: The fruitiness (low to high), such as 'tart', 'crisp', or 'mellow'. Usually indicated by puckering/drying of the tongue or salivation.

sweetness.description: The sweetness (low to high), such as 'mild', 'deep', or 'rich'. Usually indicated by how 'rounded' the fruit quality is.

body.description: The texture or mouthfeel (light to heavy), such as 'watery', 'silky', 'syrupy', or 'creamy'.

finish.description: The aftertaste (short to long), such as 'quick', 'lingering', or 'clean'. Don't rush this aspect.

flavor.description: The overall flavor of this brew, such as 'peach', 'plum', or 'cherry'.

score.description: On a scale of 1 to 10, how much did you enjoy this brew?

observations.description: Any notes about this brew, such as drawdown.

actionItem.description: Any variables to change on the next brew.
